title: Help
body: So i was downloading wooxy and different in-game fonts. Just before i even start using it can i get banned from using in-game fonts?

replies.body:
Third-party programs fall into a **use at your own risk** category. The biggest issue with these programs is that because you don't write them yourself, they can harbor features that you aren't aware are there that could provide a competitive advantage. When we look to punish for specific programs, it's usually the ones that provide a measurable competitive advantage over other players.

You can find our official post on this [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications). Let me know if you have any questions.
